data.name: FUN Platformer  DLC 2
data.detailed_description:
fun Platformer you have to survive bees and rock enemies and slime enemies you have to make it to the trophy without dying.

you have to jumped every platform without dying

you have to collect apples

you can change your character skin

you have to survive every enemies

16 maps hard and death wish will have long levels
data.about_the_game:
fun Platformer you have to survive bees and rock enemies and slime enemies you have to make it to the trophy without dying.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-9100F Processor
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 630
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required
  • Processor: i5-9400F Processor
  • Memory: 9 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: n/a
